keywords.name: BurnScry X
keywords.description: Look at the top X cards of your draw pile, you must Exhaust 1 card of them.

keywords.name: Cast
keywords.description: put Exhausted card back to hand. Status, Cruses and selfExhaust card cannot be Casted .

keywords.name: Flame Barrier X
keywords.description: When Attacked, deal X damage back. At start of turn, remove this power.

keywords.name: Imprint
keywords.description: After Exhaust or Cast one card, enemy with Imprint take damage equal to Imprint amount.

keywords.name: Metallicize X
keywords.description: Gain X block at end of turn.

keywords.name: Plated_Armor X
keywords.description: Gain X block at end of turn. Receiving unblocked attack damage reduces Plated Armor by 1.

keywords.name: 多重护甲X
keywords.description: 回合结束时,获得 X 格挡 。受到攻击伤害而失去生命时, 多层护甲 的层数减 1 。

keywords.name: 火焰屏障 X
keywords.description: 每受到一次攻击,给予 X 点反伤。回合开始时失去此效果。

keywords.name: 灼见 X
keywords.description: 观看抽牌堆顶 X 张牌,选择并 消耗 其中 1 张牌。被 灼见 消耗 的牌额外触发一次 消耗 效果。

keywords.name: 烙印
keywords.description: 每当你 消耗 或者 重铸 一张牌后,拥有 烙印 的敌人受到相当于 烙印 层数点伤害。

keywords.name: 荆棘X
keywords.description: 受到攻击时，对攻击者造成 X 点伤害。

keywords.name: 重铸
keywords.description: 将已经被 消耗 的牌返回你的手牌。状态牌,诅咒牌和本身具有 消耗 属性的牌不能被 重铸 。

keywords.name: 金属化X
keywords.description: 回合结束时,获得 X 格挡 。
